subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Celtics, who went 27-27 after a 23-5 start, may have a better team this postseason than the one that won an N.B.A. championship two years ago.
snippet: The Celtics, who went 27-27 after a 23-5 start, may have a better team this postseason than the one that won an N.B.A. championship two years ago.
